messages.subject: Yes
messages.body: Hi Kevin, Thank you for your response! I'm glad to hear you're interested in the 2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata RF Club (M6) 2dr Convertible. This model offers a thrilling driving experience with its sporty design and exceptional handling, making it a perfect choice for anyone who loves the open road. Manny Zecena is here to assist you with any questions you may have or to set up a test drive. Would you like to schedule a visit to see this fantastic vehicle in person? You can also reserve your time instantly here: Schedule Your Visit. Please let us know a convenient time for you, or you can instantly reserve your time here: <{LegacySalesApptSchLink}> Patti Tustin Mazda 28 Auto Center Dr, Tustin, CA 92782
